MaxX:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
MaxX:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

MaxX:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
MaxX:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
MaxX:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

MaxX:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
MaxX:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

MaxX:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
MaxX:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !MaxX:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

MaxX:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
MaxX:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !MaxX:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
